author: Cas van de Pol
description:
The ultimate recap cartoon of the Sonic The Hedehog Movie 3! Get all caught up (with Shadow the Hedgehog)! Tails! Knuckles! Eggman!

If you want to support the channel consider signing up to my patreon! https://www.patreon.com/casvdp
